content:
IStatefulServiceFactory IStatefulServiceFactory Interface

In this Article

Edit

Represents a stateful service factory that is responsible for creating replicas of a specific type of stateful service. Stateful service factories are registered with the FabricRuntime by service hosts via RegisterStatefulServiceFactory(String, IStatefulServiceFactory) or RegisterStatefulServiceFactoryAsync(String, IStatefulServiceFactory, TimeSpan, CancellationToken).

Syntax

Declaration

public interface IStatefulServiceFactoryPublic Interface IStatefulServiceFactory

Methods summary

CreateReplica(String, Uri, Byte[], Guid, Int64)
CreateReplica(String, Uri, Byte(), Guid, Int64)

Called by Service Fabric to create a stateful service replica for a particular service.

Methods

  • Edit
    CreateReplica(String, Uri, Byte[], Guid, Int64)
    CreateReplica(String, Uri, Byte(), Guid, Int64)

    Called by Service Fabric to create a stateful service replica for a particular service.

    IStatefulServiceReplica CreateReplica(string serviceTypeName, Uri serviceName, byte[] initializationData, Guid partitionId, long replicaId)Function CreateReplica(serviceTypeName As String, serviceName As Uri, initializationData As Byte(), partitionId As Guid, replicaId As Long) As IStatefulServiceReplica

    Parameters

    • serviceTypeName
      String
      String

      The service type that Service Fabric requests to be created.

    • serviceName
      Uri
      Uri

      The fabric:/ name (Uri) of the service with which this replica is associated.

    • initializationData
      Byte[]
      Byte()

      A byte array that contains the initialization data which was originally passed as a part of this service’s ServiceDescription.

    • partitionId
      Guid
      Guid

      The partition ID of type, a GUID, with which this replica is associated.

    • replicaId
      Int64
      Int64

      The replica ID of type long for this replica.

    Returns

    • IStatefulServiceReplica
      IStatefulServiceReplica

      Returns IStatefulServiceReplica.

Details

System.Fabric

Assembly
